description.zh-cn: 一种由天花病毒引起的烈性传染病，曾在全球范围内大流行，造成大量人口死亡，后通过全球性的疫苗接种计划被彻底消灭。
description.en: A severe infectious disease caused by the variola virus, which caused global pandemics and significant mortality. It was completely eradicated through a worldwide vaccination program.

description.zh-cn: 一种隶属于痘病毒科的大型DNA病毒，是引起人类天花的病原体，在自然情况下只能感染人类。
description.en: A large DNA virus belonging to the Poxviridae family, it is the pathogen that causes smallpox in humans and, under natural conditions, only infects humans.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，国际上最大的政府间卫生组织。领导并于1980年宣布成功扑灭天花。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations and the largest intergovernmental health organization. It led and in 1980 announced the successful eradication of smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 由世界卫生组织领导的全球性公共卫生计划，通过大规模疫苗接种和疾病监测，成功在1980年彻底消灭了天花。
description.en: A global public health program led by the World Health Organization that successfully eradicated smallpox by 1980 through mass vaccination and disease surveillance.

description.zh-cn: 英国医生，他发现了牛痘能用以预防天花，被誉为“疫苗之父”。
description.en: An English physician who discovered that cowpox could be used to prevent smallpox, known as the 'father of immunology'.

description.zh-cn: 一种含有活痘苗病毒的疫苗，用于预防天花。通过接种该疫苗，人类成功地消灭了天花。
description.en: A vaccine containing live vaccinia virus, used to prevent smallpox. Through the administration of this vaccine, humanity successfully eradicated smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 古埃及法老，其木乃伊上留有脓疱痕迹，被认为是史上已知最早的天花病人之一。
description.en: An ancient Egyptian pharaoh whose mummy bears pockmarks, considered one of the earliest known victims of smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 英国医学摄影师，在1978年伯明翰天花爆发事件中因实验室意外感染而死亡，是世界上最后一位死于天花的人。
description.en: A British medical photographer who died from an accidental laboratory infection during the 1978 Birmingham smallpox outbreak. She was the last person in the world to die from smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 1978年在英国伯明翰因实验室病毒泄漏导致的天花爆发事件，造成一人死亡，是全球最后一次天花爆发。
description.en: A smallpox outbreak in Birmingham, UK, in 1978 caused by a laboratory virus leak, which resulted in one death and was the last smallpox outbreak in the world.

description.zh-cn: 伯明翰大学医学院教授，负责天花研究项目。在1978年天花爆发事件后自杀。
description.en: A professor at the University of Birmingham Medical School who was in charge of the smallpox research project. He committed suicide after the 1978 smallpox outbreak.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，据信因感染天花而驾崩。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty, believed to have died from smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十位皇帝，据记载因感染天花而驾崩。
description.en: The tenth emperor of the Qing dynasty, recorded as having died from smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，幼年时曾感染天花并痊愈，这成为他被选为继承人的一个重要因素。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, who contracted and survived smallpox in his childhood, which became a significant factor in his selection as heir.

description.zh-cn: 日本战国时代的著名大名，因幼年感染天花而导致右眼失明。
description.en: A famous daimyo of the Sengoku period in Japan, who lost his right eye due to a smallpox infection in his childhood.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国皇帝，因感染天花而去世。
description.en: Emperor of the Russian Empire, who died from smallpox.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代。据记载，天花最早是由东汉军队南征时由俘虏传入中国。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history. According to records, smallpox was first introduced to China by captives during a southern campaign by the Eastern Han army.

description.zh-cn: 世界历史上首批全球帝国之一。16世纪，西班牙殖民者将天花带入了美洲大陆，对当地原住民造成了毁灭性影响。
description.en: One of the first global empires in world history. In the 16th century, Spanish colonists introduced smallpox to the Americas, which had a devastating impact on the indigenous populations.

description.zh-cn: 14世纪至16世纪的墨西哥古代文明。天花的大规模流行是导致其被西班牙征服的重要因素之一。
description.en: An ancient civilization in Mexico from the 14th to the 16th century. The widespread smallpox epidemic was a significant factor leading to its conquest by the Spanish.

description.zh-cn: 15世纪至16世纪位于南美洲的古代帝国。天花的流行严重削弱了帝国，加速了其被西班牙征服的进程。
description.en: An ancient empire in South America from the 15th to the 16th century. The spread of smallpox severely weakened the empire, accelerating its conquest by the Spanish.

nodes.id: 维克托·米哈伊洛维奇·日丹诺夫

zh-cn: 维克托·米哈伊洛维奇·日丹诺夫

description.zh-cn: 苏联病毒学家、卫生部副部长。1958年在世界卫生大会上提出全球扑灭天花的倡议。
description.en: A Soviet virologist and Deputy Minister of Health. In 1958, he proposed the initiative for the global eradication of smallpox at the World Health Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 美国医学家、流行病学家。1966年起领导世界卫生组织的国际天花扑灭单位，是全球扑灭天花行动的关键人物。
description.en: An American physician and epidemiologist. From 1966, he led the World Health Organization's international smallpox eradication unit and was a key figure in the global eradication campaign.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪的社会主义国家。于1936年宣布扑灭境内天花，并在全球扑灭行动中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: A socialist state in the 20th century. It declared the eradication of smallpox within its territory in 1936 and played a significant role in the global eradication campaign.

description.zh-cn: 孟加拉国女童，1975年被确诊，是世界上最后一位自然感染天花病毒的病人。
description.en: A girl from Bangladesh who was diagnosed in 1975 and is known as the last person in the world to be naturally infected with the variola major virus.

description.zh-cn: 索马里医院厨师，1977年被确诊，是世界上最后一位自然感染类天花病毒的病人。
description.en: A hospital cook in Somalia who was diagnosed in 1977 and is known as the last person to be naturally infected with the variola minor virus.

description.zh-cn: 天花是由天花病毒所致的急性接触性烈性人类传染病。
description.en: Smallpox is a severe, acute, and contagious human infectious disease caused by the variola virus.

description.zh-cn: 1959年，世界卫生大会通过了苏联提出的全球扑灭天花行动建议，并于1967年强化了该计划的执行。
description.en: In 1959, the World Health Assembly adopted the Soviet proposal for a global smallpox eradication program, and intensified its implementation in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 该全球性公共卫生计划通过系统性的疫苗接种和监测，最终成功在1980年彻底消灭了天花。
description.en: This global public health program, through systematic vaccination and surveillance, successfully led to the complete eradication of smallpox in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 1796年，爱德华·詹纳证实了牛痘能有效预防天花，他将此物质命名为“疫苗”，从而开创了现代免疫预防法。
description.en: In 1796, Edward Jenner demonstrated that cowpox could effectively prevent smallpox, naming the substance 'vaccine' and thus pioneering modern methods of immunization.

description.zh-cn: 接种天花疫苗是预防天花的最佳方法，也是全球扑灭天花行动的核心策略。
description.en: Vaccination with the smallpox vaccine is the best method for preventing smallpox and was the core strategy of the global eradication campaign.

description.zh-cn: 古埃及法老拉美西斯五世的木乃伊身上有明显的脓疱痕迹，被认为是史上已知最早的天花病人之一。
description.en: The mummy of ancient Egyptian pharaoh Ramesses V has distinct pockmarks, leading him to be considered one of the earliest known smallpox patients in history.

description.zh-cn: 珍妮特·帕克在此次实验室泄漏引发的爆发中感染天花并死亡。
description.en: Janet Parker was infected with smallpox and died during this outbreak, which was caused by a laboratory leak.

description.zh-cn: 在1978年伯明翰天花爆发事件发生后，负责相关天花研究项目的亨利·贝德森教授自杀。
description.en: Following the 1978 Birmingham smallpox outbreak, Professor Henry Bedson, who was in charge of the related smallpox research project, committed suicide.

description.zh-cn: 清朝顺治皇帝因感染天花而死亡。
description.en: The Shunzhi Emperor of the Qing dynasty died from a smallpox infection.

description.zh-cn: 清朝同治皇帝因感染天花而死亡。
description.en: The Tongzhi Emperor of the Qing dynasty died from a smallpox infection.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯皇帝彼得二世因感染天花而死亡。
description.en: Peter II, Emperor of Russia, died from a smallpox infection.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝在幼年时感染天花但幸存下来，这次经历成为他日后被选为皇位继承人的重要原因之一。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor was infected with smallpox during his childhood but survived, an experience that became an important reason for his later selection as heir to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 日本大名伊达政宗因幼年感染天花而导致右眼失明。
description.en: The Japanese daimyo Date Masamune lost his right eye due to a smallpox infection in his childhood.

description.zh-cn: 据记载，天花是由东汉军队南征越南时，由俘虏传入中国，当时被称为“虏疮”。
description.en: According to records, smallpox was introduced to China by captives during the southern campaign of the Eastern Han army in Vietnam, and was known at the time as 'luc chuang' (captive's sore).

description.zh-cn: 1520年，西班牙殖民者将天花病毒带入美洲大陆，导致其在原住民中广泛传播。
description.en: In 1520, Spanish colonists brought the smallpox virus to the American continent, leading to its widespread transmission among the indigenous population.

description.zh-cn: 天花在美洲原住民中的大流行是导致阿兹特克帝国被西班牙征服的关键因素之一。
description.en: The smallpox pandemic among the indigenous peoples of the Americas was one of the key factors leading to the conquest of the Aztec Empire by the Spanish.

description.zh-cn: 天花的传播严重削弱了印加帝国，加速了其被西班牙人征服的过程。
description.en: The spread of smallpox severely weakened the Inca Empire, accelerating its conquest by the Spanish.

relationships.source: 维克托·米哈伊洛维奇·日丹诺夫

description.zh-cn: 1958年，时任苏联卫生部副部长的维克托·日丹诺夫在世界卫生大会上呼吁全球展开扑灭天花行动。
description.en: In 1958, Viktor Zhdanov, then Deputy Minister of Health of the USSR, called for a global smallpox eradication campaign at the World Health Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 自1966年起，唐纳德·亨德森领导了世界卫生组织新成立的国际天花扑灭单位，极大地推动了扑灭天花行动。
description.en: Beginning in 1966, Donald Henderson led the WHO's newly formed international smallpox eradication unit, significantly advancing the eradication campaign.

description.zh-cn: 苏联于1936年宣布在其境内扑灭了天花。
description.en: The Soviet Union declared the eradication of smallpox within its territory in 1936.
